name: CONFUSION WORLD
description:
Luke and his beloved Merua lived in the small town of Bealzu.
One night he finished up a guild quest for Aruha, then chatted
with the weapon shop girl Lemomo, came home, and slept...

The next day... the world was changed!

Luke dashed about town making sense of the changes.
Will he (you) continue to live with Merua...
pursue a relationship with Aruha, or perhaps Lemomo...
or will all three of them be snatched away by somene else...
It's on Luke to decide!

CONFUSION WORLD is a love and cuckoldry RPG
with kissing, touching, dating and sex. Events can depend
on the date, time, or the weather. Merua, Aruha and
Lemomo's libidos can get out of control,
they can become pregnant, or they can be seduced
away -- bearing children to some other guy......
